Employee Scheduled Benefit: Choice of $5,000 to $10,000 in increments of $5,000
Spouse Scheduled Benefit: 100% of the Employee’s elected Coverage Amount
Child Scheduled Benefit: 50% of the Employee’s elected Coverage Amount (per child)
Guaranteed Insurability: Any amount of insurance for a Spouse or Dependent Child(ren) will be rounded to the next higher multiple of $1,000, if not already an even multiple of $1,000. All Coverage Amount(s) are Guaranteed Issue
